Marketing Manager Job at Cee Consult




        
    

        
        Cee Consult performs several HR services Like: Recruitment, Employee Key Performance Index/Appraisal, Employee Labor Law Relations & Compliance, HR Information and Payroll Management and Training And Development/Career Management.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Marketing Manager
Job Location: Ajah, Lagos
Industry: Real Estate

Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Develop and execute comprehensive marketing strategies for property listings, client acquisition, and brand visibility.
	Lead digital campaigns including SEO, SEM, and email marketing.
	Coordinate offline marketing efforts such as activations, signage, direct marketing, and promotional events.
	Collaborate with the sales and business development team to generate qualified leads.
	Oversee content creation, media planning, and agency/vendor partnerships.
	Analyze and report on campaign performance and ROI metrics.


Requirements


	4 - 5 years of proven experience in marketing within the real estate industry.
	A Degree in Marketing, or a related field is an added advantage.
	Strong expertise in both digital marketing and traditional media strategies.
	Excellent communication, leadership, and project management skills.
	CRM platforms, etc.


Salary
N200,000 / Month (based on experience).

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to: ceeconsultrecruitment@gmail.com using "Marketing Manager Application – [Your Full Name]" as the subject of the email.

Internal Auditor Job at Resource Intermediaries Limited




        
    

        
        Resource Intermediaries Limited is a distinguished HR Outsourcing and Consulting firm, specializing in customized recruitment solutions tailored to meet the unique needs of companies. Our proficiency extends across a wide spectrum of positions, ranging from top-tier executives to entry-level positions, covering technical, contractual, semi-skilled, and unskilled roles. Additionally, we are recognized experts in providing a range of services including Fumigation Services, Janitorial Services, Payroll Administration, Expatriate Management, Manpower Planning, Executive Training, and more.
     

            
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Internal Auditor
Job Location: Gbagada, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Supply Chain Business Solutions

Job Summary


	The Internal Auditor will be responsible for evaluating the effectiveness of internal controls, risk management, and governance processes.
	This role ensures the organization complies with statutory regulations and internal policies while identifying areas for operational and financial efficiency.


Key Responsibilities


	Conduct periodic audits of operational and financial processes
	Evaluate internal control systems for compliance and effectiveness
	Prepare detailed audit reports with actionable recommendations
	Monitor the implementation of audit findings and controls
	Identify potential risks and recommend preventive measures
	Liaise with external auditors and regulatory bodies as required
	Maintain up-to-date knowledge of auditing standards and trends


Qualifications & Requirements


	B.Sc./HND in Accounting, Finance, or related field; ICAN/ACCA is a strong advantage
	Minimum of 3 years of experience in audit, accounting, or financial control
	Strong understanding of IFRS, financial reporting, and internal controls
	Proficiency in audit software and Microsoft Excel
	High attention to detail, integrity, and analytical thinking
	Strong report writing and communication skills


Benefits


	Salary: N300,000 Monthly (Net)
	Pension, PAYE
	Leave Allowance
	13th Month Pay
	HMO
	20 Working Days Leave (post 6 months)

Job Location: Lagos

	Ensure stock re order levels are maintained at the store.
	Ensure store premise are displayed and always clean and dust free.
	Process customer orders.
	Package, label and dispatch customer orders for a damage free delivery
	Provide update to customers on orders dispatched.
	Promote sales.
	Collect and share customer feedback with Sales manager.
	Work to actualize and supersede weekly sales target.

	Minimum of Diploma in Marketing, Accounting or a related field.

	Strong communication skills

	Proficiency in applicable software and tool
